recurringTopics.title: Quality Systems & ISO 9000
recurringTopics.desc: ISO 9000 series standards, TQM (Total Quality Management), 5-S Principles, Zero Defect, and Quality Assurance benefits.

recurringTopics.title: Industrial Safety & Legislation
recurringTopics.desc: Indian Factories Act 1948 (Safety, Health & Welfare provisions), Causes of industrial accidents, and Safety measures (4 E's).

recurringTopics.title: Entrepreneurship & Start-ups
recurringTopics.desc: Definition & Qualities of Entrepreneur, Entrepreneur vs Manager, Start-up India schemes, DIC, and MSME support.

recurringTopics.title: Principles of Management
recurringTopics.desc: Functions of management (POSDC), Henry Fayol's 14 Principles, F.W. Taylor's Scientific Management.

recurringTopics.title: Project Management (PERT/CPM)
recurringTopics.desc: Difference between PERT and CPM, Network Analysis, Drawing Network Diagrams, Critical Path.

recurringTopics.title: Inventory Control
recurringTopics.desc: ABC Analysis (Always Better Control), EOQ (Economic Order Quantity), Bin Card vs Stores Ledger.

recurringTopics.title: Organizational Structure
recurringTopics.desc: Line Organization, Line and Staff Organization, Functional Organization (Advantages & Disadvantages).

likelyQuestions.title: Explain Start-up India schemes and registration benefits.
likelyQuestions.desc: Discuss features, eligibility, tax exemptions, and government support like MUDRA/Stand-Up India.

likelyQuestions.title: Explain ISO 9000 series constituents, benefits, and drawbacks.
likelyQuestions.desc: Define ISO 9001, 9004, and list internal/external benefits and documentation costs.

likelyQuestions.title: State the salient features of the Indian Factories Act, 1948.
likelyQuestions.desc: Focus specifically on Safety (fencing), Health (cleanliness), and Welfare (canteens/creches) provisions.

likelyQuestions.title: Write a short note on 5-S principles and TQM.
likelyQuestions.desc: Explain Seiri, Seiton, Seiso, Seiketsu, Shitsuke and the concept of continuous improvement.

likelyQuestions.title: Define Entrepreneur. Explain qualities and role in economic development.
likelyQuestions.desc: Discuss characteristics (Risk-taker, Innovator) and contribution to employment/GDP.

likelyQuestions.title: Differentiate between PERT and CPM.
likelyQuestions.desc: Compare based on Time estimates (Probabilistic vs Deterministic), Focus (Time vs Cost), and Application.

likelyQuestions.title: Explain ABC Analysis in inventory control with a graph.
likelyQuestions.desc: Classify items into A, B, C categories based on value and volume. Draw the graph.

likelyQuestions.title: Explain Line and Staff Organization with a diagram.
likelyQuestions.desc: Show the relationship between Line officers (Command) and Staff officers (Advisory).

commonTypes.title: Definitions (Part A - 2/3 Marks)
commonTypes.desc: Define Management, Entrepreneur, ISO, TQM, Safety, Sole Proprietorship, Market Survey.

commonTypes.title: Distinguish Between (Part B - 5 Marks)
commonTypes.desc: PERT vs CPM, Line vs Staff Organization, Entrepreneur vs Manager, Administration vs Management.

commonTypes.title: Essay Questions (Part C - 10 Marks)
commonTypes.desc: Explain ISO 9000 series in detail. Describe the steps in a Feasibility Study. Salient features of Factories Act.

commonTypes.title: Analytical/Diagrams (Part B/C)
commonTypes.desc: Draw PERT Network Diagram for given data, ABC Analysis Graph, Maslow's Hierarchy Pyramid.

commonTypes.title: Short Notes (Part B - 3/5 Marks)
commonTypes.desc: Write short notes on: 5-S Principles, Functions of DIC, Causes of Accidents, Leadership Styles.
